REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Waives the residency requirement for the commissioner of health and public health director for Putnam county
Summary: Waives the residency requirement for the commissioner of health and public health director for Putnam county.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to waiving the residency requirement for the commissioner of health and public health director for Putnam county
